channel.title: BLOG
channel.description:
Welcome to our blog!
Us
Kaya
Saige
Holly
Kannani

item.title: Zoo
item.description: The Zoo was so much fun! We saw so many awesome animals.We got “Dots” for the first time and we LOVED them! MMMMM! I want many more.My favorite animal was the Cheetah.We had a lot of fun and got super yummy hot dogs.

item.title: Sunday
item.description: Today is Sunday! Today we went to church!We dressed up . It was so much fun we are going to go to the AG Zoo today we will post some pictures later.We can’t wait to go we hope that we can get pony rides and pet the elephants.We are so happy.Post some pics later and write.Bye!

item.title: Saturday The Best Day
item.description: Our family thinks that Saturday is one of the best days of the week. We think this because we get to stay home in our pjs and watch TV or read or write or play piano or play outside.We LOVE the outdoors and we love to hike.Today we played with our dolls watched TV played FRIV read and of course played outside.
